I would like to use a single seed URL of

http://www.cs.odu.edu/~fmccown/webdev/

and have only resources with URLs that match

http://www.cs.odu.edu/~fmccown/webdev/*

be crawled.  I'm using PathScope but getting "transitive includes" 
(images, etc.) from other hosts in my crawls.

I saw this thread:

http://groups.yahoo.com/group/archive-crawler/message/2552?threaded=1&var=1&p=3

and what I can gather from it, I should be able to set max-trans-hops=0 
to solve the problem.  This does not work though.  I get the single 
crawl log entry:

2006-06-22T18:33:00.461Z   -63          - 
http://www.cs.odu.edu/~fmccown/webdev/ - - no-type #003 - - - -

Any ideas?


Thanks,
Frank
